meanings.definition: The quality or state of being brilliant.
meanings.sent1: Her brilliancy in solving puzzles amazed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The sun's brilliancy reflected off the water, creating a dazzling effect.
meanings.sent3: The cat's brilliancy in catching mice made it the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: The brilliancy of the stars in the night sky was like a thousand diamonds.
meanings.sent5: The brilliancy of her smile lit up the entire room.

meanings.sent1: The gem's brilliancy caught the eye of all who passed by.
meanings.sent2: The brilliancy of the fireworks lit up the dark sky.
meanings.sent3: The brilliancy of the polished silverware made the dining table look elegant.
meanings.sent4: The brilliancy of the diamond ring was unmatched by any other.
meanings.sent5: The brilliancy of the full moon illuminated the night.

meanings.sent1: The pianist's brilliancy on stage left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent2: The brilliancy of the acrobats' performance wowed the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The magician's brilliancy in pulling off tricks amazed both kids and adults.
meanings.sent4: The brilliancy of the artist's brush strokes brought the painting to life.
meanings.sent5: The brilliancy of the dancer's movements was mesmerizing to watch.
